hero_dishes.name: Cozido das Furnas
hero_dishes.description: Hearty stew of meats (beef, pork, chicken, chorizo, blood sausage) and vegetables cooked underground by volcanic heat
hero_dishes.origin_story: For generations, locals have used the volcanic caldeiras near Furnas Lake as natural ovens. Restaurants bury pots at dawn and retrieve them 5-7 hours later, fully cooked by the Earth
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Furnas village restaurants (30 min from Ponta Delgada), Tony's Restaurant in Furnas
